description: Get bot response time in milliseconds.
Delete the specified amount of messages in the channel. The command itself is excluded from the count. Defaults to 1 if limit is not specified.

Get a random picture of the specified member of the specified group. If group and/or member are unspecified, selects a random group/member. Group name must be typed as a single word (replace spaces with dashes or underscores). Member name can be typed out as multiple words. Group/member names have multiple aliases and should match the target group/member given sensible aliases (e.g. to query BTS, the following aliases will work: bts, bangtan, bangtan-sonyeondan, bangtan-boys; to query RM, the following aliases should also work: rm, rap monster, namjoon, kim namjoon). Parameters are case-insensitive, but the command name itself is not.
